title: New: Disclosure – Control (Feat. Ria Ritchie)
body:
**Disclosure** have a knack of persuading extremely attractive female singers to provide guest vocals on their tracks.

This new cut, co-written with the gorgeous **Ria Ritchie** is taken from their upcoming EP **_The Face_** and was made **Zane Lowe’s** hottest record earlier this evening. It’s insanely danceable whilst bringing their music to a new level of terms of the emotional connection with the listener, sure it’s not going to have you breaking down in tears, but it contains far more depth to it than previous outings. Check out _Control_ below.

It’s insanely danceable whilst bringing their music to a new level \[…\]
